abstract: Nexstar Broadcasting Group offers to buy Media General for $1.85 billion in cash and stock, potentially halting Media General's plan to buy rival Meredith Corporation.
lead_paragraph: The unsolicited offer comes less than three weeks after Media General offered to pay $2.4 billion for its rival Meredith Corporation.

headline.main: Nexstar Offers to Buy Media General for $1.85 Billion

snippet: The unsolicited offer comes less than three weeks after Media General offered to pay $2.4 billion for its rival Meredith Corporation.
